display_name: [Power to Overcome Crisis] Super Saiyan 3 Gotenks (Xeno)

kit.leader_skill: Super AGL Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Super Ultra Burning Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Elusive Super Warrior
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 150% up; For every Super Attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up (up to 150%); When there is another "Crossover" Category ally attacking in the same turn, or when the target enemy is in the following status: or: Launches 2 additional Super Attack(s); When there is another "Super Saiyan 3" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Performs a critical hit

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki
